entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Define libc targeting plan #69361
  • UdpClient GC pressure #69355
  • [API Proposal]: Make Unsafe work with readonly byref values #69352
  • Interop\StringMarshalling\UTF8\UTF8Test failing in outerloop #69349
    7.0.0
  • Bogus context name in InvalidCastException message #69341

Closed

  • HEAP CORRUPTION DETECTED in mscordaccore.dll #69353
    7.0.0
  • ARM32: Assertion failed 'varDsc->lvType == TYP_STRUCT' in 'System.SpanHelpers:Fill(byref,int,System.__Canon)' during 'Generate code' in jitminopts runs #69350
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\General\\NotSupported\\NotSupported_r\\NotSupported_r.cmd #69232
  • [Mono][WASM][Interp] 0 DLinkNodes finalized #56804
    7.0.0
  • How do I export a function with a Callback argument for use in c? NativeAOT #69328
  • Test failure JIT\\Stress\\ABI\\tailcalls_do\\tailcalls_do.cmd #69090
    7.0.0
  • ICorDebugThread::GetObject returns an ICorDebugReferenceValue object that's null #50953
    7.0.0
  • Add version.txt file to CoreCLR packages #7243
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix UTF8 string marshalling regression #69360
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Restore FP pairs when unwinding in ARM64 #69359
    Servicing-consider
  • [QUIC] Fixed work with QUIC_BUFFER #69351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add correct assembly context name to InvalidCastException message #69346
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • UOH alloc fix for hardlimit #69345
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #69343
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix debug proxy when used with blazor #69342
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Run host tests with dotnet test and enable crash/hang dumps #69340
    area-Host
  • Fix ASAN violation under Samsung's netcoredbg #69339
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Merged

  • Improve some use of Regex #68961
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix buffer overrun in dbgutil #69358
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1771311 #69337
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete a few unused definitions from coreclr pal #69357
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete incorrect asserts #69354
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not fold mismatched `OBJ(ADDR(LCL_VAR))` #69271
  • [mono][llvm] More LLVM 14.x changes. #69239
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Use more specific types in Interop.WideCharToMultiByte signature #69338
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Avoid unnecessary or duplicate PackageReferences - 7.0 Preview4 SDK work #69260
  • Ensure non-numeric types don't implement the numeric only generic math interfaces #69331
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add windows runtime packs as a workload #68981
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix missing metadata for ThreadPool Event #68876
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] JIT: fix scalability issue in redundant branch optimizer #68972
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • [mono] Fix parsing the 'nunbox-arbitrary-trampolines' aot argument. #69319
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono

Updated

  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink loop with stackalloc #69335
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add more char.Is* helpers for common ASCII sets #69318
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Address some System.Formats.Tar TODOs (infra and syscalls) #69107
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Use intrinsic for genLog2() #69333
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement constant-folding for `VNF_BitCast` #68979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • GetTotalPauseDuration implementation #68835
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Wasm conditional audit #69283
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow the inliner to substitute for small arguments #69068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Stream ReadAtLeast and ReadExactly #69272
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Arm64: Make unroll code for cpblk non-interruptible #69202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove most usages of *wprintf* family of functions #68237
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Make json source generation cancellable #69332
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm] First attempt at a wasm app host #68696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Adding Int128 and UInt128 with a base software implementation #69204
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize string.EndsWith(char) for const values #69038
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Prevent debugger deadlock with code versioning logic #68367
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
